Name: LU 627 - Zoning, 271 Sea Breeze Avenue, Brooklyn (C 190172 ZMK)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 190172 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 627).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, 271 Sea Breeze Development, LLC,\expndtw-6  filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 28d, by establishing within an existing R6 District a C2-4 District to \cf1 facilitate commercial use and allow for the applicant to apply for a Board of Standard Appeals (BSA) special permit for a Physical Culture or Health Establishment (PCE) in an existing 20-story building at 271 Sea Breeze Avenue located in the West Brighton neighborhood of Brooklyn, Community District 13 (ULURP\cf0  No.\cf1  C 190172 ZMK) (the \ldblquote Application\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\cf0\par
WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on February 7, 2020, its decision dated February 5, 2020 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on February 12, 2020;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi725\li-5\ri8\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\sa240\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued September 23\super rd\nosupersub , 2019 (CEQR No. 19DCP193K) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\cf1 Pursuant to Section 197-d of the New York City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 190172 ZMK, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission with the following modifications:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\cf0 Matter \ul underlined\ulnone  is new, to be added;\par
Matter \strike struck out\strike0  is to be deleted;\par
Matter double struck out is old, deleted by the City Council;\par
\pard\ltrpar\sa240 Matter \uldb double-underlined\ulnone  is new, added by the City Council\cf1\f1\line\f0 Matter within # # is defined in Section 12-10;\line * * * indicates where unchanged text appears in the Zoning Resolution\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri136\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 28d: by establishing within an existing R6 District a C2-4 District bounded by West Brighton Avenue, West 2\super nd\nosupersub  Street, Sea Breeze Avenue, and West 5\super th\nosupersub  Street \uldb a line 250 feet westerly of West 2\super nd\nosupersub  Street\ulnone , Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 13, as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) date September 23, 2019, \uldb and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-535. \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\ulnone\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on April 22, 2020, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
